    • ABOUT me

    I am originally from Japan and currently living in San Francisco. I have lived in Australia for 5 years and studied marketing and worked as project manager at online based marketing research company.

    I have recently joined programing dev bootcamp called Hack Reactor and currently studying 11 hours a day 6 days per week to become an awsome Javascript programer.

    Love beach, animal, nature.
